item.title: Remote Procedure Calls in Go
item.description: Introduction These days most networked applications are designed a logical, self-contained, unifunctional services. Each service communicates with other services to perform some actions such as completing user requests. For example, a notification service may contact a user management service to verify the authenticity of the user. Such inter-service communication requires communication protocal such as REST and GraphQL. In this post, I want to briefly introduce another method called Remote Procedure Calls (RPC).
